original_title: Sesame Street: Best of Sesame Street Spoofs!, Vol. 1 & 2
overview: From the beginning, Sesame Street has always been known for entertaining both children and adults with spoofs on popular culture that happen to teach something too! Now the best of these segments have been culled together in a special 2 volume release for Sesame Street fans.
title: Sesame Street: Best of Sesame Street Spoofs!, Vol. 1 & 2
